channel.title: Minor graphical issue
channel.description:
just make this command (or any related similar commands thats asking u for pass authentication):-
[code]gksu /etc/apt/sources.list.d[/code]
when it asks u for the pass , just move the mouse to anywhere on the screen = u gonna c this:-
http://i.imgur.com/183iC2q.jpg
